description:
Here at the law office of M. Blake Heath, Trial Attorney LLC, in Kansas City, Missouri, we are fully prepared to help increase your chances of obtaining maximum compensation for the injuries and losses you have suffered as the result of someone else's negligence.

Serving individuals and families throughout the greater Kansas City metro region and surrounding areas, our law firm's founder, attorney M. Blake Heath, has more than 10 years of experience successfully advocating on behalf of those in need. We have a long record of success handling complex legal challenges arising from motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, defective products, dangerous property conditions and other preventable tragedies.

Regarded as one of the top trial advocates in our region, Mr. Heath has earned numerous accolades from his peers, including the Pat Kelly Service Award in 2019, and he has maintained leadership positions with local, state and national legal organizations. This means you can expect to receive the highest level of counsel and support directly from a local attorney who has your best interests at heart. We promise to do all we can to help you obtain the justice you deserve.

To discuss your needs and find out how we can best assist you with securing a brighter future for yourself and your loved ones, contact M. Blake Heath, Trial Attorney LLC, by phone or email or through our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
